author: Pip Wells
title: Pip Wells
text: As an IT Infrastructure Projects PM, I've relied on 4Cabling to deliver project materials on time and on budget for over three years. The team are fantastic at getting what we need, and even sometimes helping us find things they don't usually stock. The product quality is fantastic, and we often order made-to-suit electrical and data cabling which is perfect and very high quality. Their shipping is second to none - from metro same-day jobs to mine sites in the middle of nowhere, it's all been spot on, on time. One single incident amongst hundreds of flawless orders, where a problem with a courier's driver left us short of cabling to finish a critical job - our account manager Okan went the extra mile late on a weekend to get the package found and delivered ASAP. The team have always been awesome to deal with, very friendly and willing to help. Thanks 4cabling!
